text: Virrei Amat station platforms Virrei Amat is a station on line 5 of the Barcelona Metro. The station is located underneath Plaça Virrei Amat, between Carrer Felip II and Carrer Varsòvia. It was opened in 1959. The curved side- platform station has a ticket hall on either end, each with two accesses. ==Services== ==External links== * Virrei Amat at Trenscat.com Category:Railway stations opened in 1959 Category:Transport in Nou Barris
title: Virrei Amat (Barcelona Metro)
